title: The Internet is identifying Capitol rioters using their own social media
description:
When they stormed the US Capitol last Wednesday, many pro-Trump rioters posted photos and videos to brag about their actions on social media. Internet sleuths and the police are using that content as evidence to prosecute the mob.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: The Capitol mob gleefully posted videos and photos of the attack all over the Internet
